evidence.claim: Streamline WorkComp utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure to support scalable workloads.
The company follows HIPAA regulations for handling sensitive health information.
Integration patterns include API and event-driven architecture to streamline workflows.
They support multiple X12 transaction sets for health insurance claims processing.
HL7 FHIR is implemented for patient data interoperability.

icp.icp_reason: Company uses X12 EDI standards and is HIPAA compliant, indicating relevance to API-first healthcare.
